name: calculator-light-ui
description: A light UI theme for Atom. (Because there are not enough light UI themes.)

baseColor.title: Base Color
baseColor.description: The color to use for the theme. (Only the hue component will be used.)

manageMiniEditors.title: Manage mini editors
manageMiniEditors.description: Whether this theme should apply its preferred UI styles to mini-editors (like the find dialog). Typically these editors are styled by the syntax theme. Enable this option if you want mini-editors to have light backgrounds without any syntax highlighting.
